lead_paragraph: Jeffrey D. Friedlander, who has worked for seven mayors, has handled such diverse issues as anti-apartheid legislation and landmarks preservation in his 45-year career.

headline.print_headline: Key Lawyer for the City, Set to Retire, Looks Back
headline.main: No. 2 Lawyer for New York City, Set to Retire, Looks Back

snippet: Jeffrey D. Friedlander, who has worked for seven mayors, has handled such diverse issues as anti-apartheid legislation and landmarks preservation in his 45-year career.
abstract: Jeffrey D Friedlander, lawyer for New York City's Law Dept since 1970, will retire in June 2015; has worked for 13 corporation counsels under seven mayors and left his mark on human rights and anti-apartheid legislation, as well as smaller cases.
